lyric: The stars are distant as always
Still shining with the light of their grand deaths in vacant space
translation: 依旧闪耀着它们在茫茫宇宙中隆重死亡时的光芒

lyric: Let it penetrate the darkness when a beast roars a final wail
translation: 让这光芒刺穿黑暗，当野兽发出最后的哀嚎

lyric: Let it penetrate my heart so I can share your pain
translation: 让这光芒刺穿我的心脏，让我也感知你的疼痛

lyric: If there is a way to collect and portray
A mood that cannot be projected into words
translation: 无法被投射成语言的心绪

lyric: If there is a way to turn back and rebuild all the long lost dreams
translation: 如果能够回头重建那些睽违已久的梦想

lyric: Another branch will grow and flourish in the future
translation: 新的枝芽会在未来生长繁茂

lyric: The breeze of your world will wake you up again
translation: 属于你的世界的风会将你唤醒

lyric: 人声 Voice: 王成功 Chenggong.W
混音 Mixing Engineer: 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
